thread.title: Halak gets 37th career shutout, Islanders beat Blue Jackets
thread.title_full: Halak gets 37th career shutout, Islanders beat Blue Jackets

title: Halak gets 37th career shutout, Islanders beat Blue Jackets
text: Add a message (optional) Success - Article sent! close New York Islanders' John Tavares, left, shoots and scores a goal between Columbus Blue Jackets' Dalton Prout, back, and Cody Goloubef during the third period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. The Islanders beat the Blue Jackets 4-0. Associated Press New York Islanders' Jaroslav Halak, left, of Slovakia, makes a save as teammate Travis Hamonic, center, and Columbus Blue Jackets' David Clarkson fight for position during the second period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press Columbus Blue Jackets' Nick Foligno, left, tries to clear the puck as New York Islanders' Travis Hamonic, right, and Johnny Boychuk surround him during the second period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press New York Islanders' Calvin de Haan, left, and Columbus Blue Jackets' Rene Bourque chase a loose puck during the second period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press Columbus Blue Jackets' Matt Calvert, right, trips New York Islanders' Josh Bailey during the first period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press New York Islanders' Kyle Okposo, right, carries the puck up ice as Columbus Blue Jackets' David Clarkson defends during the first period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press Columbus Blue Jackets' William Karlsson, of Sweden, left, carries the puck behind the net as New York Islanders' Casey Cizikas defends during the first period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. Associated Press New York Islanders' Anders Lee, left, carries the puck away from Columbus Blue Jackets' David Savard during the third period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. The Islanders beat the Blue Jackets 4-0. Associated Press New York Islanders' Thomas Hickey, center, celebrates his goal against the Columbus Blue Jackets with teammates Ryan Strome, left, and Travis Harmonic during the third period of an NHL hockey game Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Columbus, Ohio. The Islanders beat the Blue Jackets 4-0. Associated Press
